title: Grimville: The Gift of Darkness (2013) PC [FINAL]

Grimville: The Gift of Darkness (2013) PC [FINAL]

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

The quiet town of Grimville witnessed horrible crimes: a cruel murder of a circus strongman and mysterious disappearance of a mayor and his daughter. Local police had no other choice but to call the Secret Society for help. At the scene of the crime, a detective discovers that dark forces - capable of destroying the whole town Ã¢â‚¬â€œ are at the root of these problems. Your choices determine the ending. What will you choose: justice or selfishness? You will need all of your cunning and wits to unravel the evil intrigues and save Grimville from Darkness.

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

-You decide: your choices lead to 2 different endings: good or evil? 
 -Fantastic, chilling storyline with unexpected twists 
 -Interact with characters to find more details in the investigation 
 -Solve the mystery of the missing mayor 
 -remember that bdstudios site has malware 
 -Mind-blowing Mini-games and Hidden-object scenes 
 -Includes a standalone walkthrough/guide
